titleStmt.title: News from Parnassus, in the abstracts and contents of three crown'd chronicles, relating to the three kingdoms of England, Scotland and Ireland. In a poem, divided into two parts : first, to the king, secondly, to the subjects of the said three kingdoms. Dedicated to His Majesty. / By a servant to Mars, and a lover of the muses, William Mercer.
titleStmt.author: Mercer, William, 1605?-1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. W. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
